home.subtitle: Interactive Media Designer | Digital Communication Specialist

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Katherine Reyes, a student of Interactive Media Design (10th semester) and Communication with a Digital Focus (8th semester) at Universidad Icesi, passionate about graphic design, visual content creation, and digital project management. Throughout my academic journey, I have gained experience in UX/UI design, multimedia production, social media management, and project coordination, participating in both academic settings and freelance initiatives. My approach combines aesthetics and functionality to develop innovative visual solutions that communicate effectively. I consider myself a creative, organized, and proactive person, with technical skills in tools such as Adobe Creative Suite and Figma, as well as experience in creating content for social media and executing digital strategies.
